content:
<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="javaee-to-jakarta-namespaces-00014">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.xml" pattern="ejb-jar_3_2.xsd"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the Java EE XSD with the Jakarta equivalent">
                    <message>Replace `ejb-jar_3_2.xsd` with `ejb-jar_4_0.xsd` and update the version attribute to `"4.0"`</message>
                    <link href="https://jakarta.ee/xml/ns/jakartaee/#9" title="Jakarta XML Schemas"/>
                    <quickfix name="javaee-namespaces-replace-ejb-jar_3_2-xsd" type="REPLACE">
                        <replacement>ejb-jar_4_0.xsd</replacement>
                        <search>ejb-jar_3_2.xsd</search>
                    </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
